text:
Hey Nana, I still havent' had the chance to check out the game, I'll do it over the coming week!
The reason I've been so busy is because I'm actually moving jobs, going to a smaller company called Lunar Animation to work on Game Trailers and Cinematics. It was an opportunity that showed up and I felt the need to experience, as much as I love working at Framestore, if I don't try this one, I'm not sure I'll ever get the chance to again, so I'm jumping on this opportunity as a chance to learn from a different experience :smiley:
Let me know if you have any questions about it!
